entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:39AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WELL ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES FOR EARLY THIS WEEK... Warm weather with well above normal daytime highs will persist through at least Tuesday for Southeast Alaska. Temperatures will rise to highs ranging from the mid 70s over more southerly locations to the mid 80s over northern and central locations and Misty Fjords.
